accueil_title: Welcome to the Portfolio of Foulail Oumar

bts_intro_text: The BTS SIO trains students for IT careers with two specialisations: SLAM (development) and SISR (networking).
bts_voillaume_text: A complete training with strong academic support.
bts_sio_text: The BTS develops skills in development, networks, cybersecurity and information systems.
